actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to repeal the authority to establish an adverse effect wage rate, for nonimmigrant aliens brought into the United States for temporary agricultural labor, higher than the highest of the Federal or State minimum wage rate or the prevailing wage rate.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit the Attorney General from setting the adverse effect wage rate (for temporary agricultural worker admissions) higher than the highest of the Federal or State minimum or the prevailing local wage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to repeal the authority to establish an adverse effect wage rate, for nonimmigrant aliens brought into the United States for temporary agricultural labor, higher than the highest of the Federal or State minimum wage rate or the prevailing wage rate.
